short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extensions is created by StudentQR.com. Please read term of usage at https://www.studentqr.com before using this extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The StudentQR is a behaviour assessment and attendance system for students using a QR code. This extension was created to help in autofill the SSDM (Sistem Sahsiah Diri Murid) by exporting data from the StudentQR systems.
This will help teachers in Malaysia save time and be productive by uploading all the positive behaviors in SSDM systems automatically with a single click. The recorded data will be accurate as the data is inserted into the StudentQR system in real time by scanning the student QR code.

FAQ: https://www.studentqr.com/ssdm
